query:
select
                count(distinct s.id) as total_messages,
                count(distinct l.media_id) as total_media
            from thread t
            join message s on s.thread_id = t.id
            left join media_link l
                   on l.target_id = s.id
                  and l.link_type = 'Message'
            where t.room_id = $1
